short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you find the needle in a haystack -- for example, you can use it to search for the best product out of 50+ options.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* Go to Amazon.com
* Do a search as you normally would 
* From the *search page*, click the extension icon 
* Type in what you're looking for (can be as complex as you want. Anything you can describe in words, go for it). 
* Click "Start Search"
* Voila!
